articles.title: By firing his enemies, Trump made their taxes more interesting to the IRS

articles.author: Kate Sullivan and Donald Judd, CNN
articles.title: Biden signs executive order aimed at safeguarding abortion rights
articles.description: President Joe Biden signed an executive order Friday aimed at protecting abortion rights in response to the landmark decision by the Supreme Court overturning Roe v. Wade.
articles.content: President Joe Biden signed an executive order Friday aimed at protecting abortion rights in response to the landmark decision by the Supreme Court overturning Roe v. Wade.

articles.author: Thomas Catenacci
articles.title: US jobs level still below pre-pandemic level 28 months later, despite June job growth
articles.description: The overall number of employed Americans remained beneath its pre-pandemic level recorded 28 months ago despite a strong jobs report Friday morning, federal data showed.
articles.content:
The U.S. posted strong job growth in June, but the total number of employed Americans remained below its pre-pandemic level, federal data showed.
Employers added a more-than-expected 372,000 jobs la… [+2674 chars]
